snippet.title: After Death - Official Announcement Trailer | English
snippet.description:
After Death's first trailer
After Death is an independent first-person police horror game developed by Starpixel Studios. Players will embody the ghost of a recently murdered prosecutor who retains no memory of his life. He's forced to solve the case of his own death in order to rest in peace, but it won't be that simple since the  Reaper is lurking. Explore the police station in search of information to solve the case before the Grim Reaper catches you, or find another way to escape the police station. After Death will be coming to PC starting January 18, 2025.

Add After Death to your wishlist on Steam! :)
